original_text: “When you go out to war against your enemies, and the Lord your God gives them into your hand and you take them captive,
korean_text: 네가 나가서 적군과 싸울 때에 네 하나님 여호와께서 그들을 네 손에 넘기시므로 네가 그들을 사로잡은 후에

sentences.original_text: When you go out to war against your enemies,
and the Lord your God gives them into your hand
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 그들을 네 손에 붙이시고,
